nodes.text: Starfighters of the Rebellion, the Republic and the Resistance
"Starfighters of the Rebellion, the Republic and the Resistance" is the eighth booklet in a series of canon reference booklets of the Star Wars Encyclopedia and was published on November 13th, 2020.

The winner of galactic battles is not always the one with the most massive devices: like great warships, star hunters have often played a decisive role in clashes. The Galactic Republic as well as the Rebel Alliance and Resistance knew this tactical datum and used it successfully on several occasions. Their star fighters - bombers, interceptors or any other type of vehicle - were characterized by great maneuverability often compensating for limited firepower, often less than that of heavier fighters. From the famous X-wings known throughout the galaxy to fighters with characteristic shapes such as the B-wing or the U-wing, their performance in many battles was always remarkable.
